headline.print_headline: Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, U.S. Boxer Famous in Folk Song, Dies at 76
headline.main: Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, U.S. Boxer Famous in Folk Song, Dies at 76

lead_paragraph: Former U.S. professional boxer Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, who spent 19 years in prison for murder and then was released after it was determined he did not get a fair trial, died on Sunday at the age of 76, according to his friend and caretaker John Artis.
